title: The best Jenson Black Friday deals | Big discounts on bikes, components, clothing and more
content:
We have delved deep into Jenson’s Black Friday deals to find you the products with the best savings.

With the sale spanning components, clothing and even full bikes, we’ve highlighted some of the best deals below.

You can take a look at all of the Black Friday deals on Jenson’s website.

Best Jenson Black Friday deals

Magura MT Trail SL Brakeset – $659.99 $299.99 (save 54%)

Jenson

The MT Trail SL Brakeset is Magura’s set of lightweight trail brakes, with a claimed weight of 230g per brake (240g for the front, 220g for the rear). The front brake has a four-piston caliper, while the rear uses a two-piston caliper.

  • Buy the Magura MT Trail SL Brakeset with 54 per cent discount from Jenson

Industry Nine Hydra Enduro S Wheels – $950 $799.99 (save 16%)

Jenson

The Hydra Enduro S Wheels are said to balance trail agility with enduro toughness, with the wheels featuring 30.5mm internal rim measurements and Industry Nine’s Hydra Hub, which boasts 690 points of engagement.

  • Buy the Industry Nine Hydra Enduro S Wheels with 16 per cent discount from Jenson

G-Form Pro Rugged Kneeguards – $79.99 $26.62 (save 67%)

Jenson

These knee pads from G-Form feature lightweight, flexible impact-absorbing pads and a sleeve with silicone grips to keep them in place.

  • Buy the G-Form Pro Rugged Kneeguards with 67 per cent discount from Jenson

Shimano SH-GR501 Shoes – $110 $39.99 (save 64%)

Jenson

These flat-pedal shoes from Shimano feature reinforced toe and ankle protection to keep your feet safe when hitting the trails. The SH-GR501’s sole is said to increase grip on flat pedals, which should keep your feet planted on the rough stuff.

  • Buy the Shimano SH-GR501 Shoes with 64 per cent discount from Jenson

Norco Sight C3 2023 – $4,699 $2,999.94 (save 36%)

Jenson

This all-mountain bike features a 160mm RockShox Lyrik Select fork and a RockShox Super Deluxe Ultimate shock that controls the 150mm of rear-suspension travel. Shimano’s Deore drivetrain is used, as well as the Japanese brand’s BR-MT520 four-piston disc brakes.

  • Buy the Norco Sight C3 2023 with 36 per cent savings from Jenson

Niner RIP 9 RDO 29 GX AXS – $7,349 $3,999.94 (save 46%)

Jenson

This Niner is exclusive to Jenson and sees a 150mm Fox Factory 36 fork up front, with a Float X2 Factory shock sitting in the frame. SRAM’s GX Eagle AXS 12-speed wireless electronic drivetrain is used alongside the brand’s G2 R hydraulic disc brakes.

  • Buy the Niner RIP 9 RDO 29 GX AXS with 46 per cent discount fr0m Jenson

Santa Cruz 5010 5 C MX SDS+ Frame – $3,120 $2,203.50 (save 29%)

Jenson

This 5010 features a mullet setup and uses Santa Cruz’s VPP suspension system to articulate 130mm of rear-suspension travel. The frame comes with a RockShox Super Deluxe Select+.

  • Buy the Santa Cruz 5010 5 C MX SDS+ Frame with 29 per cent discount from Jenson

Race Face T2 Tailgate Pad – $209 $99.99 (save 52%)

Jenson

Race Face’s T2 Tailgate Pad has capacity for five or six bikes depending on size, and will save the rear end of your pickup from getting beaten up. The Pad is made from PVC tarpaulin with a micro-brushed inner lining and features a window for your reverse camera, for when you’re not carrying bikes.

  • Buy the Race Face T2 Tailgate Pad with 52 per cent discount from Jenson

Maxxis Assegai 29″ Trail OEM Tire – $101 $45 (save 55%)

Jenson

The Maxxis Assegai is a well-renowned all-round performer, which we rated a rare 5 stars thanks to its excellent grip and shape. This 3C MaxxTerra EXO+ version comes without any packaging and features the white OEM decals.

  • Buy the Maxxis Assegai with 55 per cent discount from Jenson
author: Nick Clark
